To learn more about defining an index, see Create Index (REST API).An Indexer drives the pipeline. The three components you've created thus far (datasource, skillset, index) are inputs to an indexer. Creating the indexer on Azure AI Searchis the event that puts the entire pipeline into motion.
To tie these objects together in an indexer, you must define field mappings.The "fieldMappings" are processed before the skillset, mapping source fields fromthe data source to target fields in an index.
